title: The Naked Prince
description: USA Today bestselling author Sally MacKenzie delights again with this perfect confection of romance, intrigue, sexiness and humor…An Invitation To SinJosephine Atworthy is shocked by the goings-on at her rich neighbor’s house party. Quite shocked. But her demure charm beguiles a mysterious nobleman, who begs a kiss—then another. And in a twinkling, they may be falling head over heels in love…Previously appeared in the anthology An Invitation to Sin.
author: Sally MacKenzie
